Html:
Hi
I'm trying to add an XSL file of AMA citation (that i downloaded from this site) to my word 13 but it doesn't work... probably because it's an old version that matches word 10.
do you have an AMA.XSL file that is good for word 2013??
(I tried to change the code according to the instructions here - i just can't :/ )
i'll appreciate your help
Thanks!
If you take the first from this site, it should work with Word 2013 as I upgraded all styles except MHRA months ago.

I did... still doesn't work. maybe it's the location of the file?
i tried:
C:\Program Files\Microsoft Office(x86)\Office14\Bibliography\Style
and
C:\Program Files\Microsoft Office15\root\office15\Bibliography\Style
(I have two office packages installed on my computer since i did an upgrade - maybe that's the problem??)
Thanks
Those are not the folders where you should add the file for Word 2013. Check the installation instructions.

Fount it!
The problem was - it was a hidden folder so i couldn't see it when i first tried to paste the file.
Thanks
